issue.title: mail.google.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#search/iqos/FMfcgzQfBGhCzvWQrVTfwqjCHLxBDNnB](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmail.google.com%2Fmail%2Fu%2F0%2F%23search%2Fiqos%2FFMfcgzQfBGhCzvWQrVTfwqjCHLxBDNnB) ### Comment > If I enable AdGuard URL Tracking Filter > The IQOS promotional email does not appear in Gmail ### Screenshots

Block trackers,

issue.title: gizmodo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://gizmodo.com/spheres-wizard-of-oz-re-release-was-one-of-2025s-highest-grossing-films-for-one-big-reason-2000712070](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgizmodo.com%2Fspheres-wizard-of-oz-re-release-was-one-of-2025s-highest-grossing-films-for-one-big-reason-2000712070) ### Comment > Site detects AdGuard is active and disables scroll. Main culprit seems to be a `overflow: hidden !important;` that gets injected into the root `` node when AdGuard is active, might be related to the cookies consent banner, which doesn't seem to get blocked properly ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/bl0ucit7ssg04ooo4k0gc80kgg0g0owqocw9m3kgdc.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/qjsdpwe4mqogsck44woo0k44ooskws84t299t7zokq.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v8.0.0 Beta 2 (5269) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.28020.0` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `https://unfiltered.adguard-dns.com/dns-query`
Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard URL Tracking,
Legitimate URL Shortener

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
Adblock Warning Removal List

Other:
AdGuard Experimental

Language-specific:
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | enabled Userscripts: | `tinyShield (url: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@filteringdev/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js)`
`AdsBypasser (url: https://adsbypasser.github.io/releases/adsbypasser.full.user.js)`
`AdGuard Extra (Beta) (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (Beta) (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Other extensions used: | `Windows Defender` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=8.0.0+Beta+2+%285269%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.28020.0&browser=chrome&filters=2.5.9.17.18.19.20.21.22.207.251&dns_servers=https%3A%2F%2Funfiltered.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query&userscripts=tinyShield%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fcdn.jsdelivr.net%252Fnpm%252F%2540filteringdev%252Ftinyshield%2540latest%252Fdist%252FtinyShield.user.js%29%252C%250AAdsBypasser%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fadsbypasser.github.io%252Freleases%252Fadsbypasser.full.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28Beta%29%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Fbeta%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28Beta%29%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Fbeta%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=false&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=true&stealth.enabled=false&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=false&stealth.DNT=false&stealth.x_client=false&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=false&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=false&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=false&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=3000&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=false)

issue.title: gizmodo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://gizmodo.com/spheres-wizard-of-oz-re-release-was-one-of-2025s-highest-grossing-films-for-one-big-reason-2000712070](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgizmodo.com%2Fspheres-wizard-of-oz-re-release-was-one-of-2025s-highest-grossing-films-for-one-big-reason-2000712070) ### Comment > Site detects AdGuard is active and disables scroll. Main culprit seems to be a `overflow: hidden !important;` that gets injected into the root `` node when AdGuard is active, might be related to the cookies consent banner, which doesn't seem to get blocked properly ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/bl0ucit7ssg04ooo4k0gc80kgg0g0owqocw9m3kgdc.png?nc=1)
